# Outputs Directory

This directory contains generated files from the markdown migration tools.

## Generated Files

### `import.json`
Generated by: `npm run generate` or `node src/generate.js`

The Contentful import file containing the markdown content formatted for import via the Contentful CLI. This file includes:
- Entry metadata (content type, publish status)
- Localized fields (title, markdown content)
- Ready to be imported with `npm run import`

### `validation-errors.csv`
Generated by: `npm run validate` (with export option) or `node src/validate.js --export-errors`

A detailed CSV report of validation errors and warnings found in the markdown file. Includes:
- Error type (Critical/Warning)
- Category (Broken Image, Broken Link, Missing Alt Text, etc.)
- Line numbers
- Element details
- Descriptions and additional context

## Usage

These files are automatically generated by the migration scripts and can be safely deleted or regenerated at any time.

**Note:** This directory is included in the repository but the generated files (*.json, *.csv) are gitignored to avoid committing generated content.
